main.name: Korneli Nastas
main.description: a full stack web developer & photographer
main.bio: I am a creative web developer, who aims to work with small businesses and marginalized communities to bring their passions to life. I offer both design and development services of web applications or websites, as well a volunteer for shooting a local Event.
main.contactmessage: If you have any other questions or would like me to clarify anything else, please, let me know. I am always glad to help in any way I can.

resume.skillmessage: i like to improve processes and practices with new ideas, concepts, methods and technologies.
